summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for MoneyTeam stock trading platform. All 23 test cases passed with 100% success rate after fixing a minor field mapping issue in trading endpoints.

resolved_bugs.issue: Pydantic validation error - MongoDB _id field not mapped to id field in TradeResponse model
resolved_bugs.fix_applied: Added field mapping in get_trades and execute_trade endpoints to map _id to id

minor_observations.issue: Rate limiting causing fallback to demo data
minor_observations.impact: No functional impact - demo data working perfectly
minor_observations.status: Expected behavior as mentioned in requirements

passed_tests: User login and JWT token authentication
Stock quote retrieval (AAPL) with demo data
BUY trade execution (2 shares AAPL at $185.92)
SELL trade execution (1 share AAPL at $185.92)
Portfolio updates after SELL (cash: $99,814.08, 1 position remaining)
Trade history retrieval (2 trades: BUY and SELL)
Get watchlist with real-time price data
